examples.example: 在这大千世界里，有着无尽的美好等待我们去发现。

translate.english: In this big world, there are endless beauties waiting for us to discover.

examples.example: 人生的道路上纵然有千难万险，我们也要勇往直前。

translate.english: Even if there are thousands of difficulties and dangers on the road of life, we should also march forward bravely.

examples.example: 人生路上纵然会遇到千千万万的困难，但只要我们保持乐观，就一定能克服。

translate.english: Even if there will be thousands of difficulties on the road of life, but as long as we remain optimistic, we will definitely be able to overcome.
